name: APBEST
short_description:
Program: APBEST--Analysis of Protein Block and Evaluation of Substitution  Type										
Version:--v01:10B										
Author:(c)--Parth Sarthi Sen Gupta, Shyamashree Banerjee, Chittran Roy,Rifat Nawaz Ul Islam, Buddhadev Mondal, 
Arnab Nayek and Amal Kumar Bandyopadhyay*; 								
Department of Biotechnology, The University of Burdwan, WB, India, 713104														


FEATURES:
The program performs three kinds of computations: a. observed hetero-pair related detailed analysis,
 b. positional variability and
 c. positional mutation related information.
summary: APBEST--Analysis of Protein Block and Evaluation of Substitution Type
